metadata.name: 2.2.2 Prevalence of malnutrition among children under 5 years of age (weight for height&gt +2 or < -2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards), by type (wasting and overweight)
metadata.target: 2.2 By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
